Subject: Carabande (aka PitchCar)
Description:
A skill-packed automobile race requiring intuition and dexterity. The cars are colored wooden disks which are flicked over the race course. With the right touch, they fly over the track, zipping around corners, and sweep between opponents' cars in daring maneuvers.
  Speakers include:Mark Geary - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Roborally
Description: It’s a slow day at the widget factory, so the central race computer has prepared a RoboRally tournament for the factory computers. You can be one of those computers. Navigate your robot across conveyor belts, over gears, and past pushers in your effort to be the first to touch all the checkpoints. But watch out for the other robots, not only are they trying to beat you to the checkpoints, but they might even push you off course. Don’t forget the lasers. Easy to learn, hard to master.  Speakers include:Mark Geary - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 2 hours and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
